name: Bull Rush
description:
Description

You play as a bull, dreaming of a china shop labyrinth from which you must escape. Complete each level as quickly as possible, but be careful - the bull will become enraged as he breaks the fine china!

Controls
  • W/Up : Accelerate
  • A/Left : Turn Left
  • D/Right : Turn Right
  • S/Down/Space : Brake
  • R : Reset Current Level
  • Esc : Return to Menu Level
Tips
  • Use the brakes! It will help going into tight corners at high speeds. 
  • Vases won't slow you down when you break them, so you can potentially take a shortcut (as long as your bull can take another hit!)
Credits
  • Tileset used: Super Retro World Interior Pack by The low-res arist (Twitter @Pixelart_asset) https://gif-superretroworld.itch.io/interior-pack
  • Music lovingly composed by my partner and sequenced in LMMS by me
  • Bottle Breaking sound effect by spookymodem https://opengameart.org/content/breaking-bottle
  • Cow sound effect by Secretlondon https://opengameart.org/content/farm-animals
Known Issues

The HTML build has inconsistent performance. Try downloading a desktop build if you are experiencing bad performance in your browser.

I have not tested the OSX and Linux builds, so there could be issues specific to those versions.
